Provides an AWS Backup vault lock configuration resource.

```csharp
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.Linq;
using Pulumi;
using Aws = Pulumi.Aws;

return await Deployment.RunAsync(() => 
{
    var test = new Aws.Backup.VaultLockConfiguration("test", new()
    {
        BackupVaultName = "example_backup_vault",
        ChangeableForDays = 3,
        MaxRetentionDays = 1200,
        MinRetentionDays = 7,
    });

});
```


</pulumi-choosable>

<pulumi-choosable type="language" values="go">

```go
package main

import (
	"github.com/pulumi/pulumi-aws/sdk/v6/go/aws/backup"
	"github.com/pulumi/pulumi/sdk/v3/go/pulumi"
)

func main() {
	pulumi.Run(func(ctx *pulumi.Context) error {
		_, err := backup.NewVaultLockConfiguration(ctx, "test", &backup.VaultLockConfigurationArgs{
			BackupVaultName:   pulumi.String("example_backup_vault"),
			ChangeableForDays: pulumi.Int(3),
			MaxRetentionDays:  pulumi.Int(1200),
			MinRetentionDays:  pulumi.Int(7),
		})
		if err != nil {
			return err
		}
		return nil
	})
}
```


</pulumi-choosable>

## VaultLockConfiguration Resource Properties {#properties}

To learn more about resource properties and how to use them, see [Inputs and Outputs](/docs/intro/concepts/inputs-outputs) in the Architecture and Concepts docs.

### Inputs

The VaultLockConfiguration resource accepts the following [input](/docs/intro/concepts/inputs-outputs) properties:



<div>
<pulumi-choosable type="language" values="csharp">
<dl class="resources-properties"><dt class="property-required property-replacement"
            title="Required">
        <span id="backupvaultname_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#backupvaultname_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Backup<wbr>Vault<wbr>Name</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Name of the backup vault to add a lock configuration for.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-optional property-replacement"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="changeablefordays_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#changeablefordays_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Changeable<wbr>For<wbr>Days</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">int</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>The number of days before the lock date. If omitted creates a vault lock in <code>governance</code> mode, otherwise it will create a vault lock in <code>compliance</code> mode.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-optional property-replacement"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="maxretentiondays_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#maxretentiondays_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Max<wbr>Retention<wbr>Days</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">int</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>The maximum retention period that the vault retains its recovery points.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-optional property-replacement"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="minretentiondays_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#minretentiondays_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Min<wbr>Retention<wbr>Days</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">int</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>The minimum retention period that the vault retains its recovery points.</p>
</dd></dl>
</pulumi-choosable>
</div>

<pulumi-choosable type="language" values="python">
<dl class="resources-properties"><dt class="property-required property-replacement"
            title="Required">
        <span id="backup_vault_name_python">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#backup_vault_name_python" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">backup_<wbr>vault_<wbr>name</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">str</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Name of the backup vault to add a lock configuration for.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-optional property-replacement"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="changeable_for_days_python">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#changeable_for_days_python" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">changeable_<wbr>for_<wbr>days</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">int</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>The number of days before the lock date. If omitted creates a vault lock in <code>governance</code> mode, otherwise it will create a vault lock in <code>compliance</code> mode.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-optional property-replacement"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="max_retention_days_python">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#max_retention_days_python" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">max_<wbr>retention_<wbr>days</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">int</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>The maximum retention period that the vault retains its recovery points.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-optional property-replacement"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="min_retention_days_python">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#min_retention_days_python" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">min_<wbr>retention_<wbr>days</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>

</dd></dl>
</pulumi-choosable>

<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#state_backupvaultname_go" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Backup<wbr>Vault<wbr>Name</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Name of the backup vault to add a lock configuration for.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-optional property-replacement"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_changeablefordays_go">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#state_changeablefordays_go" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Changeable<wbr>For<wbr>Days</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">int</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>The number of days before the lock date. If omitted creates a vault lock in <code>governance</code> mode, otherwise it will create a vault lock in <code>compliance</code> mode.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-optional property-replacement"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_maxretentiondays_go">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#state_maxretentiondays_go" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Max<wbr>Retention<wbr>Days</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">int</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>The maximum retention period that the vault retains its recovery points.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-optional property-replacement"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_minretentiondays_go">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#state_minretentiondays_go" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Min<wbr>Retention<wbr>Days</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">int</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>The minimum retention period that the vault retains its recovery points.</p>
</dd></dl>
</pulumi-choosable>
</div>

## Import



Using `pulumi import`, import Backup vault lock configuration using the `name`. For example:

```sh
 $ pulumi import aws:backup/vaultLockConfiguration:VaultLockConfiguration test TestVault
```
